attributes.action: the RSPCA must deregister as a charity. the Charity commission refuses to act
attributes.additional_details: Evidence exists of invalid warrants are obtained by RSPCA. we dont live in a victorian era to just conduct raids upon civilized people and their animals causing terrible anguish civil liberty violations dead animals stolen animals dead or missing people and hundreds living traumatized. the rspca has lies upon courts commit perverting of justice. the rspca needs to be held up for manslaughter the charity commission absolutely refuses to investigate the rspca making claims its out of jurisdiction.
attributes.background: the RSPCA has RSPCA inspectors asking police to fetch warrants on false grounds leading to dead animals stolen animals dead or missing people The RSPCA put lies upon courts. The RSPCA commits perverting of justice in courts. The charity commision refuses to act stating out of jurisdiction

rejection.details: A petition must state what it is asking the Government or Parliament to do: as drafted, the present petition appears to be addressed to the RSPCA.
